author: IBM Technology
description:
Can AI really be your friend? 🤖 In this video, we explore the rising world of AI companionship and “AI friends" — diving into the ethics, safety, and philosophy behind artificial intelligence as emotional support. Discover how OpenAI’s safety models shape the way we connect with AI, and what this means for the future of human‑AI relationships.

#aiethics #aimodels #aicompanionship
title: AI as a Companion? Ethics Explained

title: Orchestrator Agents & MCP: Multi-Agent Systems for Smarter Automation
